Uses of Class
de.uni.bamberg.wiai.minf.forflow.datagenerator.controller.datageneration.distribution.ProbabilityDistribution

Packages that use ProbabilityDistribution
de.uni.bamberg.wiai.minf.forflow.datagenerator.controller Represents the controller of the MVC pattern; it's not allowed to get access to the data model directly, instead use this package to do so. 
de.uni.bamberg.wiai.minf.forflow.datagenerator.controller.datageneration.distribution To make data generation flexible and not static, random data is used; This data is calculated by probability distributions. 
de.uni.bamberg.wiai.minf.forflow.datagenerator.controller.worker Long running background tasks for I/O, database or any other computational intensive task are separated from the EDT. 
de.uni.bamberg.wiai.minf.forflow.datagenerator.model Represents the data model of MVC pattern; therefore, the data structures used in this application are stored here. 
de.uni.bamberg.wiai.minf.forflow.datagenerator.model.datastructure Contains the Meta-Meta-Model artefact class describing the EMF Ecore Meta-Model. 
de.uni.bamberg.wiai.minf.forflow.datagenerator.view Represents the view of the MVC pattern and interacts with the user through a UI.
